website_summaries.verdict: The perfect costume for kids, especially for young girls wanting a dynamic hero outfit.
pros: The Wonder Woman costume design is age appropriate for kids around 3 to 10 years old
The fabric is comfortable to wear for long periods of time
cons: Large sizes for older kids run on the smaller side
Refer to measurements for the best fit

customer_reviews.title: Exact measurements for small
customer_reviews.text: The costume is what u would expect for a Halloween costume. I don't think it will last rough play so it will go in the closet till Halloween. As other reviews have mentioned the belt and shoes run big while the skirt runs small. My measurements in the photo are for size Small; hope they help someone trying to figure it which size to buy. My girl is about 39" and weights only 27 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: NetPatel

customer_reviews.title: Mini Wonder Woman!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely satisfied by this purchase. My daughter is obsessed with all things Wonder Woman and she has worn this costume at least 50 times already! The only problem I have come across is the Velcro not sticking any longer, but as I said, she has gotten A LOT of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Skinny 6yo - I bought a small. Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality at this price. It’s velvet soft and looks like it can hold up a few washes. Good for kids who like to rewear their costumes. Sizing- my daughter is 6 yo, 46” at 44lbs. Starting to look like a doe. I got her a small even though it’s for 3-4 years old. I realize it’ll be short, but at least there wasn’t a lot of extra fabric width wise. The belt is tie on and holds the extra fabric back. She could wear white stocking with this outfit. The “boots” come above her knee which is cute that way but it is loose. I’ll figure something out if it bothers her too much.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and well made. As good if not better than the costumes at the Halloween store for a fraction of the price. I ordered A small, she’s a size 6/7 in girls. I got gold leggings separately because it’s cold and it is too short for nothing else. She’s really tall and skinny though and I didn’t want it to be baggy. She also wore an under armor shirt under for warmth. The only reason it’s not 5 stars is because the cape shed red metallic stuff all over our car. Other than that it’s awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Dauenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable wonder woman costume
customer_reviews.text: I loved this costume. It fit my daughter perfect. She just turned 6, 46" tall, 45lbs and I got size Small. I have seen reviews and my own husbands comment about how short it is...yes, its short, but if you know who Wonder Woman is, you know her costume isn't exactly modest lol. Besides I have my daughter wear bike shorts under it and I have no issue with it at all. She wears it all the time while taking care of her babies lol.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old loves it! Wears it daily and I ordered a small and had to improvise where the boots are concerned to keep them up. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Costume is cute and good quality for a costume. Not the best, obviously by the price, but not cheap looking. By the end of Halloween day though the bright beautiful blue of the skirt had sort of rubbed off and it made it look gray and dirty kind of. It is a little short as others have mentioned so plan on adding some leggings or tights. My daughter is 5, wears a 6/6x, and is short for her age but it barely covers her bottom. Went with a small but probably should've went with a medium. It will work though. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori R.

customer_reviews.title: Small fits like size 4
customer_reviews.text: The outfit looks good. I like that it doesn’t have glitter. The accessories fit my 4.5 year old fine, but the sizing of the dress is off. Small is supposed to fit 44”-48” tall. My 4.5 year old is under 43”, and the dress is already quite short. That’s the style so the length is about right now. She just started wearing size 5, which is too big. So this really fits more like a size 4. There’s no way she could wear it if she grew a couple inches without showing a bit too much. My daughter also found the cuffs and headband itchy after just a few minutes. I don’t know if it’s the seams or the foam.
customer_reviews.author: Rooibos Drinker

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this costume and can’t wait to be wonder women for Halloween. She lives dc super girl hero’s show lol It’s decent quality. I like that the cape is very well velcro’d to the outfit. The boots really don’t fit well over her shoes. But we aren’t concerned with that. Everything else is perfect and fits well
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: This says small 4-6 yrs but it was so tiny, more for a 2 year old maybe? I have a tall thin 5 year old and this was definitely too short more like a tunic than a dress, the boot covers were big, gauntlets and tiara fit fine,it has a costume velvet bodice and shiny pretty skirt, looks nice just wrong sizing had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Rosie S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Girls!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (5) loves it. She's been blocking imaginary bullets & shooting candy from her wristbands. She is about 45lbs, 47" -- we bought the size 4-6 based on some reviews, and the skirt ends up around her hips. It actually fits my 1yo daughter better. The package is conflicting, it says: "Small, USA Size 4-6, For 3-4 Years". So, I guess Small is actually for 3year olds. Stitching is definitely a bit shoddy, as other reviewers have said, but I'm giving it the 4 stars because it's a great deal for the price. The costume is bright, sparkly, and the accessories are pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: ljt

customer_reviews.title: Runs VERY short
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is cute. Exactly what to expect for a kids costume. Not the best quality, but good for kids. I will say that it runs VERY small in length. The package says fits age 4-6. However, it’s the perfect length on my 3 year old. It was purchased for my 5 year old and it’s super short. Be carful about the size you buy.
customer_reviews.author: SPNICS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5yr old
customer_reviews.text: So I was concerned about the size of this for my daughter. She is turning 5 this month and probably on the short size of things. The dress fits nicely, the skirt comes up in the back, but with some leggings under she will be fine. Decent quality of costume. The accessories are nice as well. Its not itchy and overall she has been wearing it daily since it arrived. I think it will do nicely for halloween.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fonte

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Costume is exactly as shown in the picture but i suggest getting a size or two bigger. Bought a size small for my daughter who wears an xsmall(4/5) in girls and the small was a bit tight but will do for her to wear for Halloween next week. Also the skirt was really short literally right below her bottom but was planning on putting tights underneath anyways. Other then that’s good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw away costume
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small, very cheap material. My daughter enjoys playing dress up in her old costumes after Halloween and this is one that is not made to last more than one wear. Shoe covers abnormally large look bad may as well toss out don’t bother using, they will annoy your child falling down all night.
customer_reviews.author: pmb

customer_reviews.title: Love this costume!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Wonder woman costume, I got it for my daughter costume party. The only issue I had is that the feet cover don't stay up the whole time they fall down and you have to be pulling it up. In general the costume is beautiful and my daughter have use it many times now!
customer_reviews.author: Sary

customer_reviews.title: It fit her pretty well, however
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6-year-old. It fit her pretty well, however, I wish the dress was a little longer. It was a little short on her. Considering I had her wear it on top of her clothes, it worked great. Because she loved it, and because she saw it was a very popular costume this year, I'm giving it a 5!
customer_reviews.author: YML88

customer_reviews.title: GREAT super hero costume!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT Wonder Woman costume! The cut of the dress is adorable, but be aware it is VERY short so get some red or blue bloomers to cover that tiny booty. My daughter put the boot covers over her tall knee boots and it worked great, they will not stay up without tall boots underneath them. All the other parts are great too; belt, headband and cuffs all fit well and had no defects. The colors are rich and bright and it is super shiny. It is better made than a lot of costumes we have had. She and my son play dress up daily and this is a favorite in her costume box!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Really loved it when we first got it
customer_reviews.text: Really loved it when we first got it. It was nice shiny and soft. But My daughter has long torso so with this being all one piece the top of skirt came up bit high and made the skirt pretty short. We had to use spanks underneath. Had to tape down boot cover to bottom of shoe because they slip right up over shoe, they just dont stay in place. When I washed it the headband and belt became useless. So wash those by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J.

customer_reviews.title: kept falling off my daughter
customer_reviews.text: The dress was fine alone, but the belt will not stay up, the boots are fabric with an elastic piece to slip over regular shoes ( did not like that). The headband keeps slipping one way or the other. Make better costumes. The kids are running around, jumping, crawling, ect. Pretending to fly isn't easy when your costume falls off. :(
customer_reviews.author: Donttestme

customer_reviews.title: This. Costume. Is. Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3.5 year old daughter for Christmas. She has barely taken it off since then. The fabric is sparkly/shimmery, and looks fantastic. I don't know how well it will hold up over the next few months, but the look of it is just great. The accessories - boot covers, belt, tiara, and bracelets - are a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Supper cute. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my daughter spirit week (villains vs heroes) and the quality and style super cute how ever for it to fit her properly it was super short, not a big deal to me just make sure to put some leggings underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Josue De La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst Halloween costumes I've ever bought. The dress is waaaay too short, the boot covers are a joke (don't be deceived by the product photo...they constantly fall down and look silly), the wrist bands are awkward (my daughter flat out refused to wear them) and the cape keeps coming off the back of the dress (there's Velcro to attach it but it's clearly not strong enough. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: PA mom

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! it fits well and my daughter can play in it for along time not only a one time use which is nice. We can also hand it down quality is pretty sturdy. It came wiht all the accessories which is amazing and it looks and fits just like the picture. I am very pleased. The price point was also great I didnt feel liek I over paid for what I got which is always nice. My daighter loves running around in it pretending whihc makes this mom a very happy mom
customer_reviews.author: AWeis

customer_reviews.title: She loved her Wonder Woman Costume for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: My Grandaughter is 5 and tall for her age. She loved her Wonder Woman Costume for Halloween. (She actually wore it two weeks before Halloween) . Her Mother had trouble getting it off of her. It fit her perfectly. Because she is tall, my daughter had her wear shorts underneath the skirt because it was a little short. Not terribly though. Well worth the cost..
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Bolan

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This says it fits size 4-6 my daughter is a size 5 and it fit a little tight on the top and it’s way too short. It seems the front is a lot longer than the back. The front was about mid thigh and the back was above her butt. And my daughter is pretty petite all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old LOVES the costume!!
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old granddaughter LOVES the costume!!! She’s 41.5” tall and around 48 lbs. Fit is good with a little layering capability for a cold Halloween (we live in Minnesota)
customer_reviews.author: Pennagirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute! I bought a small for a four year old. It’s just a little big but we didn’t want form fitting anyway. She can’t wear the “boots” unless I make some alterations. The quality seems good. It does require pants or leggings or something, the dress is too short.
customer_reviews.author: ApplePearl

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman lives!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves pretending to be Wonder Woman. The dress part is perfect though she is 42 inches tall & weighs 40 lbs. The belt is is 5 inches too large and the arm cuffs fit me - the boot tops look like the should be with the medium set as they would fit a 1 or 2 size shoe plus they go above the knee. I sew and can easily fix them - just would be nice if the belt were adjustable and the boots were a little more in line with rest of the costume. This costume is very well constructed and is durable enough for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: no nonsense

customer_reviews.title: Short!!!!! But very cute
customer_reviews.text: First order came in without any accessories (just the dress). No problems getting a new one sent. It was very cute but VERY short. When my daughter bent over you could see her full panties. Also, boot covers fell down even after my mom put elastic & ties in them. No way they would of ever stayed up without it the elastic added. My daughter is 5 and we ordered the small (4-6). She is short for her age too so if you have a tall daughter I would order the M. Overall it was very cute & my daughter loved it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bergeron

customer_reviews.title: when I opened the box the item looked like it was missing some of the packaging paper
customer_reviews.text: Daughter tried it on before Halloween and it tore at the seams. Very flimsy material. Think this was a repackaged item, when I opened the box the item looked like it was missing some of the packaging paper, and label of the item. I returned it. It was also smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Mom x2

customer_reviews.title: Complete HIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a last minute gift for my 4 yr old daughter at Christmas. I read reviews about how horrible the material was...blah, blah, blah...BUT when I got ours I didn't think it was that bad. Since I did spend less than $10 I think you get what you pay for. Although I have washed it twice, it still is holding up nicely. The boot covers are way to big, but we just put pony tailed holders around them and it's fine. Great play outfit! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B. Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. Bright colors. Easy to put on and off. She loves the arm bands and head ornament. It's a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Luci

customer_reviews.title: size information is way off
customer_reviews.text: I was really upset to open this box that I received just in time for my daughters birthday only to find that the costume would barely fit a two year old. It was listed as fitting 44" - 48" so I thought I was getting a costume that would fit my four year old for some time, instead I couldn't even give it to her since there is no way she would be able to put it on. Now I need to go through the hassle of returning the item to get my money back. We need to rely on size information in product descriptions, this was so far off that it was clearly never checked by anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this costume! It was perfect for Halloween and we still use it for dress-up. Seems well made and has endured a bit of abuse from a 5 year old without any damage. The colors are vibrant and the material is very nice on it. We initially ordered the smaller size (per the dresses fit recommendation) and it was WAY too short, her bottom would show if she raised her arms. The larger one is a bit big on her but we just get to love it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Charmom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay for one time use. The material on the bottom (skirt) is very sensitive and will fade if wrinkled or in any way folded. My daughter wore it for Halloween and by the end of the night the color and shine were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Velia Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: Super costume
customer_reviews.text: We saw this costume in a high-end catalogue and were thrilled to find it for a better price online. It's clearly the same costume: same accessories, same packaging/ad photo, etc. The main costume is the best portion and fit well (these things always run a little small, but seem consistent). The boots, however, were too big for me (the child's mother). On the other hand, the headband had to be rigged to fit. I'm not sure it would go around a one-year-old's head. We added elastic to increase the diameter and allow for future use. For the price, it's all very reasonable. And, my daughter absolutely loves the costume (without the boot covers).
customer_reviews.author: Sea for Me

customer_reviews.title: Missed head band in package
customer_reviews.text: We are missing head band in the package . My daughter is so excited to have it but once we open we couldn’t find head band and she is so upset and we don’t have time to place order again so we bought another dress.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The costume is OKAY. I know this is just a kids costume, but I would have expected the quality to be a little better. I don't anticipate this will hold up well. My 4 year old loves it. The skirt is beautiful and it fits her well. She's 41" 40#, so I think on a smaller girl it might be a little big. Love the cape, but the boot covers were way too long for her legs. 4/5 because you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: kassichi88

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Small and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I went by their measurements, but this was WAY too small for my daughter. This should be advertised for a 2-3 year old. She wore it at her birthday party for about an hour and the emblem on front started ripping away from chest, which also made a hole in the chest. Therefore, I didn't even bother trying to return. The arm cuffs are 2 different sizes and an adult could wear them. The boot covers are ridiculously big and don't fit anything like this picture. Waste of money. My daughter is left with the headpiece and belt to wear around until I buy her a replacement. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: rrb

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was of great quality. I think it runs a little small, as my daughter is 5 years old and usually fits into 4T-5T (depending on the article of clothing). My only complaint is that the leggings/"boots" do not have sufficient elastic at the top and would not stay up. We ended up using a few small rubber bands to keep them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Pizzarello

customer_reviews.title: Adorable costume!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute costume! Fit my 6 year old perfectly. She insisted in wearing the belt a little higher than it should go, but it’s still looked precious on her. We haven’t washed or worn the costume again, but it worked perfectly for Halloween night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Cute outfit but short skirt. The star on the headband was VERY off center as well. Luckily the kid didn't care
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Reading these reviews, I was a bit nervous buying this costume. But for only $15.00, this costume was great! I bought a Small for my 4 year old and it fit perfect. Only problem were the boots....for this size costume they are way too long and only kept falling down her legs. The material is what you would expect from a kids costume, especially for this price. She has worn it a handful of times already and its holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Wonder Woman costume!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this costume and so did I! Great quality and it came with the dress, the cape, the headband, the boot covers and wrist bands. It fit her as expected and she had room for a turtleneck and leggings underneath since it was a little chilly! A dress up favorite of the kids!
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Cutest outfit
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect! A bit cold out so we modified with leggings and a sweater but it was so cute and fit great. My daughter is 4’3” and 54 pounds and we got her the medium size. It was a little big on her but not in a bad way. The shoe covers are great because the bottom is open so you don’t have to worry about them getting dirty
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: This suit is disposable, cannot be washed!
customer_reviews.text: Costume look very good, my daughter used it and looked lovely on it. But after the first wash, the blue on the skirt faded terribly, so its only useful to be used once. Im very dissapointed!!! Wish it last longer, because my daughter was so in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Jesús Francisco Santana Kasse

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren loved this outfit
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved this outfit!!!! The quality is pretty good, the look excellent. The price was reasonable. Would buy it again for them if they out-grow this one. The costume fit very well for Hope, 5 years old, and River, 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Joan R.

customer_reviews.title: Horribly made. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I usually have good luck with this brand of costumes but this one is horrible. Headband Velcro doesn't stay closed at all and would fit an American doll- not my 5 year old. Wrist bands are silver while the headband and belt are gold. Boots won't stay up- ridiculously big. If it wasn't for the fact she's be devasted, I'd return it.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: the costume is super cute and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6, and is the shortest kid in her class. She's always been petite, and this costume was still so short on her that when she bent over her panties were showing. I only took off 1 star because otherwise, the costume is super cute and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Super short...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price but wow is this costume short! Excessively short. 2 inches longer would make a BIG difference in appropriateness for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are fair
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying and it is true what they say. The skirt is a bit short and the boots run big. But it won’t keep us from using it. I’ll just have her wear leggings under it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but sizes are waaay off...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small (size 4-6) for my petite 6 year old. It fits her perfectly as in not too tight, but it is definitely too short. It does not cover her bum. Luckily I found Wonder Woman tights. It's so oddly shaped. The boots and belt are huge on her. I'll have to fix them, the dress is too short, and the headband is waaay too tiny. Kinda sad for spending that much on a costume. She loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E Shipman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE SIZING!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this costume and it has been washed several times and holds up. I'm now ordering it again 9 months later in a bigger size. Last year, when she was 3, I got a small, and though she is small for her age, the headband was way too small-- like for an infant. The boots, however, were huge-- they fit my 12 year-old. Since the small is now getting too short on her, I'm going to order a medium for my 34 lb., 39" 4 year-old, which seems bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: Hagfish

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this was a set and you didn’t have to spend more money and time exploring for the other pieces needed to complete the costume! Super durable! Bright colors and true to size!!! We loved it! I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Limon

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume (if slightly modified)
customer_reviews.text: Costume seems to be well made and my daughter loves it. We had to put leggings on her due to the skirt being quite short. Also, the leg covers that came with the costume were way too big for her legs. My wife had to sew in an elastic band so that they would stay up on her. She has worn it around the house and to two events already with no issues. It will be worn again tonight and tomorrow and then go into her 'dress up' bin.
customer_reviews.author: CAD72311

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Confortable for playing and running around
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to feel a lot cheaper based on the price and was pleasantly surprised by the quality. Comfortable and she loves it. The boot things are comically large (they would fit a much larger kid), but not a big deal, everything else worked great.
customer_reviews.author: M and A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the Little Wonder Women
customer_reviews.text: Nice costume! The quality is great, and my daughter loved it! It wears nicely, and I plan to try and save this for Halloween! The shoe covers also fit nicely over her sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well made and my girls were thrilled with these costumes. Soft and not itchy. They wore them for days in a row!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looked more like a long shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this by following the measurements... DO NOT DO THAT! it fit every wear but... was too short. it looked more like a long shirt. Probably wouldn't look bad with some cute black leggings underneath but not the look I was going for that day.
customer_reviews.author: LunaLikeTheMoon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We loved this costume. Purchased the shield separately and gold leggings. added a long sleeve shirt. The skirt is extremely short but works great with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is a size to small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and 44-1/2 inches tall which would be a size small according to the chart but it was literally so tiny! If she bent over just a little her tushy was out no matter what she’s wearing under neath this isnt how the costume should be! Also the tag says Small Petite and it doesn’t say that on my order.
customer_reviews.author: jaret carbone

customer_reviews.title: It is PERFECT! I got this for my daughter's 3rd birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: It is PERFECT! I got this for my daughter's 3rd birthday size small. The boots were like thigh high's so I'm not using it. I bought the crown, cuffs and shield separately from Amazon. The dress is very good quality and comfortable. So pretty. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: The best Wonder woman kids costume ever!
customer_reviews.text: My baby looked so beautiful in her costume! The material was perfect and the color was so bright and pretty. I got the small and it fit her perfectly even though it was kinda short due to her height. I just got black sheer tights to go under and she was cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vikkii

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I try to keep my expectations low with kids costumes. Sometimes they barely make it through the night. I am really impressed with this costume. My 5yo LOVES it. It’s great looking. The skirt is quite short, she will not be able to go without shorts or pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great price and material.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size - My daughter is small for her age (6) and I bought a smaller size and it fit perfectly (except the boot covers-her legs are skinny but I used safety pins to help them stay up)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter looked super cute! Only issues were that the belt would ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter looked super cute! Only issues were that the belt would slide up onto her chest and the boot covers would slide down her legs while she was walking around, (you could pin the belt, not sure how to secure the boot covers). My daughter wears size 5 and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: best costume money EVER spent
customer_reviews.text: The look on my daughter's face when she put this on was priceless! One of the best costumes I've ever bought. For perfectly for my small four year old (boot covers a little tall but still cute).
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, good material. My daughter wears a 5 or xs, she is a tad bit tall. This outfit fit her perfectly around, just a little short for her. Shoe covers were very large around for her but I can’t complain. We still loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super super cute! I ordered a small for my 6 year old. She has a very small frame, and wears a 6 in regular clothes. This fit perfectly and is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra G.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great and was very durable. My kid definitely had the best costume! All the accessories were just wonderful. It was also very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: zeb mcallister

customer_reviews.title: So, so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for my almost 3 year old. I always order Halloween costumes early September in case I have to exchange for a different size. She typically wears a size 3. It fits her perfectly and she she LOVES it! Like others have said, the boots are HUGE and I'm not sure how we'll get them to work, but I'm otherwise happy with the costume. The quality of the costume is top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: ATau

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The outfit looks exactly as described but is very short (and my toddler is already short). When my 4 year old wears it you can still see her shorts on underneath (just so you can get an idea of how short it is. It also arrived with a small tear in the middle of the skirt area and if you slightly pull the skirt the tear will run. I would return it but it's for a superhero themed birthday party and I would not be able to get a new one in time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best Wonder Woman costume ever.
customer_reviews.text: it was perfect..I was afraid the small was going to be too small but new the med would be too large.it fit perfect and my5 year old great granddaughter looooves it..it came with everything..this is a great buy and highly recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Denney

customer_reviews.title: Very Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My cousins daughter wanted something Wonder Womanish to play dress up in. This costume was the closest I could find. It came sooner than expected. It is very cute, fit her pretty well - the wrist cuffs & belt are way too big but otherwise she looks great in it. When she opened it at her party all of the little kids loved it, even the little boys. I think they liked how shinny the blue skirt was with the stars all over it. The only downside was the patch on the top was only partially sewn on. I had to sew it the rest of the way on myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but runs small. I ordered the small ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but runs small. I ordered the small for my four year old who is skinny and wears size 6. Barely covered her undies. Definitely size up. The medium (package said 8-10) is big on her torso but long enough to cover undies, so we will keep that size. Bright colors, my little one loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mamakate

customer_reviews.title: Love it & just make adjustments for it being short
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this costume! She tried it on today and immediately lit up. I will say that generally she wears a 5T in dresses and needs the extra length because of her height. In everything else she wears a 4T. I bought a small (says it fits 4-6) and it fits her well overall but just a heads up that it's definitely a really short costume. We will have to buy bloomers in order for her to actually wear it out trick or treating. BUT it looks great otherwise, I'm happy with the purchase and she definitely felt like a superhero when trying it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing accessories
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a super hero party and my mistake didn't open it until the day of the party. It was missing all of the accessories. The headband, belt, arms bands, and boot covers!!! How frustrating! I will be returning this as it is now useless to my daughter who picked this one based on all of the included accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the small size...
customer_reviews.text: The size chart stated small is size 4-6, product came in even labeled as size 2-4. Size chart has apparently since been edited, but still says size 2-6. 2-4 is accurate. (my child is 5-6.) Quality seems about as I would expect for today's store bought costumes. Size is my only complaint. (And I'm sorry, even if somehow I read the chart wrong the first time, there is a huge difference between size 2 and size 6. It can not be grouped all into one.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Good costume
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Order the next size up if your kid is tall/longer-legged. I did not. But I found blue leggings she’ll wear for her Halloween costume. But it’s a good costume.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Just great. A great gift for your little wonder women out there.
customer_reviews.author: Questriot

customer_reviews.title: Better!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter likes this costume better than the others but we still had to make adjustments in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old has decided to be a super hero for Halloween this year instead of a princess ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a winner!!!! My 4 year old has decided to be a super hero for Halloween this year instead of a princess (this is shocking). As soon as we received the costume she immediately put it on and wore if for hours. It runs a bit small, and the boot covers are really big at the top. Even with that it's a really cute costume :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen R

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat defective, but still a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this outfit but one of the arm bands came ripped and one of the boot/socks came with something yellow on it. Not happy about it but not at all worth the effort of mailing it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: My little girl LOVES this costume!
customer_reviews.text: This costume made my little girl VERY happy... She's worn it everyday since it was delivered. I ordered a small for my 4 year old who is on the small side. It's slightly big on her, but not too big. The skirt is quite short and the 'boots' are way too long and loose - nothing a pair of leggings and either a sewing machine or some safety pins won't fix. For the price it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Little girls dream come true
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 5 year old just right. So cute she thinks she is the real Wonder Woman. She is in love with this character
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume, leggings are a bit long though. Very well made material, I ordered a small for my 4yo
customer_reviews.author: Abel G Arocha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Soft material. Bought for a birthday party. Very happy. My daughter has lived in this costume for weeks and it's still in great condition
customer_reviews.author: ShannonF

customer_reviews.title: my 4 year old daughter love it, but the shirt/dress is the only thing ...
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old daughter love it, but the shirt/dress is the only thing that fits her. everything else is tooooooo big. The braclete, leggings, and belt are way too big. It would fit a teenager or adult. These parts seem to be one size fits all, but they don't.
customer_reviews.author: dave1004

customer_reviews.title: Slightly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it but the leg things are big. Idk any kids with legs that big. We had to put ankle warmers under them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: The costume is perfect but the dress is too short
customer_reviews.text: The costume is perfect but the dress is too short
customer_reviews.author: nirosta

customer_reviews.title: the headband is not comfortable, the costume runs a little small but was ...
customer_reviews.text: The leggings don't stay up for very long, the headband is not comfortable, the costume runs a little small but was SUPER CUTE and a huge hit at Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: and she was very pleased. I was less pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute costume. My 5 year old picked it for Halloween, and she was very pleased. I was less pleased. The 'boot' pieces are cheaply made and do not stay up. More importantly, this skirt is extremely short. I live in Florida, and Halloween is still pretty much Summer here. She had to wear leggings under the costume, which made her too hot. Ideally, this should come with little shorts built in.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Penguin

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: It was great a little small but white shorts underneath it worked perfectly for my 5 year old. She absolutely loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable, but was not expected for the price. Fit was good for 3 year old, excpet boot covers were a bit long. Grandma has had to resew a couple of items, but the outfit has been worn most of the day for about a week so far, including having been slept in the first night. Overall a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: cute but runs short
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has long legs, so I don't know if maybe we ordered wrong. This was super short and she had to wear leggings under it, but otherwise it was a cute outfit.
customer_reviews.author: B. temple

customer_reviews.title: Cute & durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a dance costume. It fit well & looked super cute on. Good materials & she's now playing with it alot
customer_reviews.author: L. Tarbox

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and great quality overall. The boots are a different material than the picture and fit kind of strange but everything else is really nice and it fit my daughter great. SHE LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for my 4 year old. Decent quality considering the price. The boots are the only part that never really get worn as they don't stay up - - and a lot of pieces to lose with the wrist cuffs, headband, belt, and boots - but a very cute dress up outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great costume
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this outfit and has worn it almost every day since Santa brought it to our house. Great fit. Vibrant colors. Seems to be well made overall, in the sense it stands up to a 4 year old. The boots are a bit baggy and large so she hasn't taken to them though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

product_meta.title: Super DC Heroes Wonder Woman Child's Costume
product_meta.description:
Size:Small| Color:As Shown| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingNow your little one can be Guardian of Themiscyra and Princess of the Amazon's in this officially licensed DC Comics deluxe Wonder Woman costume set. Features a sleeveless dress, solid red upper bodice with golden Wonder Woman logo on front, blue skirted bottom with white stars and attached golden belt at waistline, attached red cape in the back. Complete with a gold tiara headpiece, silver wrist gauntlets and red and white pull on boot tops that fit over her existing shoes. She'll have everything she needs to become Wonder Woman in this costume set. Includes dress, wrist gauntlets, tiara, and boot covers; shoes sold separately. Rubie's offers a wide variety of officially licensed hero and villain costumes for group or family dress up fun. Rubie's Costume Company has been bringing costumes and accessories to the world since 1950. As the world's leader, we take our mission seriously to make dressing up fun! Mascots, rental quality costumes, masks, wigs, accessories, shoes, and every significant licensed costume you want to wear can be found under the Rubie's brand. Still family owned and still family focused, Rubie's brings you fun for every season: Halloween, Christmas, Mardi Gras, Easter, and every occasion in-between.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Fighting for truth and justice everywhere. The Wonder Woman costume includes: dress with red top and blue with white stars bottom and attached red cape, red & white boot tops, silver bracelets, and gold headpiece.
feature_bullets: OFFICIALLY LICENSED DC COMICS deluxe Wonder Woman Costume set
SLEEVELESS tank style dress with attached cape and belt, wrist gauntlets, tiara headpiece and pull on boot covers
READ BEFORE BUYING: Costumes are not sized the same as apparel, use Rubie's Children's size chart, reviews and Q & A for best fit, do not choose based on age or clothing size
COORDINATE with other OFFICIALLY LICENSED costumes by Rubie's for group and family dress up fun
Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. since 1950, Rubie’s has classic and licensed costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for your entire family

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
